mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (flightDateId, userId, totalPrice) VALUES (#{flightDate.id}, #{user.id}, #{totalPrice})

INSERT INTO passenger(orderId, firstName, lastName, nationality, passport, price, orderClass, place) VALUES
#{order.orderId}, #{e.firstName}, #{e.lastName}, #{e.nationality}, #{e.passport}, #{e.price}, #{e.orderClass}, #{e.place}
mapper.select:
SELECT o.orderId, o.userId, o.totalPrice, o.flightDateId,
fd.flightId,
p.ticket, p.firstName, p.lastName, p.nationality, p.passport, p.orderClass, p.price, p.place,
u.id AS u_id, u.lastName AS u_lastName, u.firstName AS u_firstName, u.userType, u.password, u.patronymic AS u_patronymic, u.login FROM orders o RIGHT JOIN flight_date fd ON o.flightDateId = fd.id RIGHT JOIN passenger p ON o.orderId = p.orderId RIGHT JOIN user u ON o.userId = u.id WHERE o.orderId = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE passenger SET place=#{place}, row=#{row} WHERE ticket=#{ticket}
